chapter.text: You may be asking, “Why me? ^1500Why us? ^1500”, and I have to say. ^1500I don’t quite understand it either. ^1500I don’t quite understand why you all specifically. ^1500All I know is that you’re exactly what I have been looking for. ^1500What I have needed all of these years. ^1500The time is finally approaching. ^1500Sometimes you don’t realize what is missing until you find it.
